post.title: Harry’s In The Basement
post.content: 100′s of unread blog entries, 100′s of new emails, no new posts on DevHawk.net. It’s almost like I’ve been offline at a team meeting in Vegas for three days. Actually, it’s exactly like that. Next week will be more of the same, as I’m on vacation (taking my son Patrick to meet his Great-Grandmother). So today is my big chance to get caught up on everything.
